title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client library for the Ollama server.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip-installable wrapper around the REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama models as LLM and chat components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Self-hosted ChatGPT-style web interface for any Ollama model.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with sync/async APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing a fluent interface to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Lightweight Node CLI wrapper around ollama-js for quick prompts and chats.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or chatters in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for deploying, fine-tuning, and extending Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server in containers.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri-based desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app that connects to local Ollama instance for interactive sessions.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community-maintained Go client for Ollama with generate/chat/embed helpers.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama with thread-aware conversations and model switching.

title: ollama-datasets
summary: Curated datasets and scripts to create custom GGUF models compatible with Ollama.
